Copyright for the printed edition rests with the School of Celtic Studies, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies, Dublin. The electronic edition was compiled with the kind permission of the copyright owner.

listBibl.head: The edition used in the digital edition

titleStmt.title: Book of Leinster, formerly Lebar na Núachongbála
titleStmt.editor: R. I. Best and M. A. O'Brien

samplingDecl.p: The present text represents pages 761–781 and 785–841 of the volume. The Metrical Dindshenchas (available in separate files), the Prose Dindshenchas, and Togail Troí have been omitted. Editorial introduction, notes and indexes have also been omitted. Missing text supplied by the editors is tagged sup. Expansions to the text are marked ex.

correction.p: Text has been checked and proofread twice. All corrections and supplied text are tagged.

normalization.p: The electronic text represents the edited text.

segmentation.p: div0=the whole document; div1=the section; stanzas are marked lg. Line-breaks are numbered every five lines using lb. Unnumbered line-breaks are commented out.

interpretation.p: Names of persons (given names), and places are not tagged. Terms for cultural and social roles are not tagged.

profileDesc.creation: By Irish scribes in monastic scriptoria, based on older materials. 1150–1190

langUsage.language: The text is in Middle Irish.

change.item: Keywords added, file validated; new wordcount made.

div1.head: Incipit Cath Ruis na Ríg
div1.p:
INam i mbai Conchobor i nEmain mínétrocht Macha ár cur chatha na Tana lais. Conna baí bíad ra
tholathar dó &ersir; connar chotail co sám. &ersir; connaro ataim do neoch d'Ultaib cid donrat samlaid ri tremsi na teora coícthiges. & atchuas d'Ultaib anísin .i. Conchobor do bith i sergg &ersir; i sírgalar. &ersir; conna baí biad ra tholathar dó &ersir; connar chotail co sám. &ersir; connaro ataim do neoch d'Ultaib cid donrat
samlaid. And sin dori&ndot;gned tinól &ersir; tochostul ac Ultaib co hEmain minetroct Macha. & ra comarliced accusom dano. Cia bad chóir do choibsegud na cnedi ra cnedaig ríg Ulad. &ersir; in galair buirb ras básaig. &ersir; ros bánaig ra tremsi na coicthiges. Conn a baí biad ra
tholathar do &ersir; connaro ataim do neoch d'Ultaib cid donrat samlaid. Iss ed ro raidsetarsom uili dano corop é in nech ros ail &ersir; ros n-irthócaib .i. Cathbad druí degamra.

Ro luid reme dano Cathbad druí degamra co hairm i mbai Conchobor &ersir; cíís déra folcmara forruada fola corbo &fdot;liuch blae &ersir;
brunni dó Airchisis Conchobor do déor Chathbaid. Maith ám and sin amo phopa Chathbaid ar Conchobor. cid dotgní tursech dobbrónach domenmnach. Ro fail ám a morabba damsa sain ale for Cathbad. Na fetar ca cned rat chnedaig. &ersir; ca galar borb rot básaig. &ersir; rot bánaig ra tremsi na teora coicthiges. Fail áni a
morabba damsa bar Conchobor. dáig damriachtatar cethri ollchóiceda Herend. & tuctha leosum a n-áes ciúil &ersir; airfiti &ersir; admolta combad lériti na hairgni. &ersir; combad moti na hurbada. &ersir; ra loscit ar &ndot;dúnaid &ersir; ar &ndot;degbaleda connach arddi íat nas a n-airidni &ersir; a n-immellaige. & barroebris dano Ailill &ersir; Medb cath
formsa. &ersir; rucad láeg mo bó fadéin a purt éicne uaimse. & is samlaid ro boí ca rád &ersir; atbert na briathrasa and.

lg.l: Mo damsa is dam dond Dáire
Ni lia esbaid daim na bó

div1.p: Maith ám a m'anam a Chathbaid bar Conchobor Cade do chomairlisiu dún. &ersir; is amlaid ra baí ca rád &ersir; atbert na briathra.

lg.l: Nirbo chóir do Meidb don Maig.
ciarsa dam co nda mbeind óir.
Cembad é a damsi bad mó
áeg ar mbó féin fath amne
Meir is forni im laeg ar mbó
Noco chath na tuitt rí redg.
sluag do thérn am a cath chain.
mo tharbga ac troit na dá tarb;
mebais mo chride a Chathbaid. A.

div1.p:
Is hí mo chomairlese duit ale bar Cathbad. anad din chursa. Daig at garba na gáetha. &ersir; at salcha na sligeda &ersir; at móra na haibni &ersir; na huscida. &ersir; at gabalta lama láech ra den am dunad &ersir; dindgna i crichaib echtrand. & an dún in t⋅ín co tudca ⋅amratta chucaind. corop cerchaill cach fót feránach. corop suntaich ar seneich. Corop
séitrig ar serraig. Corop slána ar fir da fuilib. &ersir; chnedaib a haithli chatha Thanad Bó Cualnge. Coro gairdi na haidchi ri fot &ersir; ri foraire &ersir; ri freccomas i n-iathaib bidbad &ersir; i críchaib echtrand. Is amlaid ra boí ca rád &ersir; atbert na briathra.

& an dún ale bar Cathbad dáig ní fuil tár do t inchaibsiu and
sin. Dáig echlach ras ruc i n-aithed &ersir; i n-élúd uaitsiu tri lár catha fer &ndot;Herend síar sechtair. & da ructha can digail bad chotamus do chétamus fair sin. Acus faítti fessa &ersir; tecta uaitsiu chena cot chairdib écmaissi .i. Co Conall crúaid coscorach commaidmech cathbuadach claidebderg co airm i fail ac tobuch a chisa &ersir; a chanad
i crichaib Leódús i n-insib Cadd &ersir; i n-insib Or. &ersir; i críchaib Scithia &ersir; Dacia &ersir; Gothia &ersir; Northmannia ac tastel Mara Ict &ersir; Mara Torrián &ersir; ic slataigecht sliged Saxan. & faítte fessa &ersir; tecta uait no cot chairddib écmaisse co iathaib Gallecda co Gallíathaib na nGall. .i. Co Amlaíb Ólaib hua Inscoa rig Lochlainne. Co Findmór
mac Ro&fdot;ir co ríg sechtmad rainni de Lochlainn. Co Báre na Sciggire Co dunud na Piscarcarla. Co Brodor Roth. &ersir; co Brodor Fiúit. amp co Siugraid Soga ríg Súdiam. Co Sortadbud Sort co ríg Insi Orc. Co secht maccaib Romrach Co hIl co Ile Co Mael co Muile. Co Abram mac Romrach Co Cet mac Romrach Co Celg mac Romrach
Co Mod mac Herling. Co Conchobor coscarach mac Artuir meic Bruide meic Dungail. co mac ríg Alban. &ersir; Clothra ingen Conchobuir a mathair.

Cia do ragad risin tectairectsin bar Conchobor. Cia do ragad and bar Cathbad acht mad Findchad mac Conchobuir and sut. &
Aed Cáem mac Conaill Chernaig. & Oengus mac Oenláma Gábae. & Cano Gall do múnud eoluis dar muncind mara &ersir; mór&fdot;airge dóib. Is and sin ra lotar sin rompu dar muncind mara &ersir; mór&fdot;airgi co hairm i mbaí Conall Cernach i críchaib Leodús. & condnoathatar dano na scela ro batar accu do Chonall. Ferais dano fálte fri

Findchad mac Conchobuiramps. &ersir; dobretha a láim dara bragit &ersir; dobretha teora póc do. Is and dano barridnachtatarsom dósum Táin Bó Cualnge do breith a hUltaib. Sceinnis a chridi cruaid colomda Conaill a miduactur a chléib. immar thoirm tuinne trethanglasi ra tír. Atdirsa brethir am bar Conall mad da mbeindse i crichaib
Ulad conna bertha in táinsin can digail bad chotamus don chetamus fair. Is samlaid ro baí Conall dano &ersir; fessa &ersir; furic arna ndén am dó and sin. &ersir; ba gléire descad &ersir; ba aibbgetus a hóla and sin. amp robretha Conall in fleidsin do mathib Ulad. & faítte dano fessa &ersir; techta uad coa chairddib écmaisse fo iathaib Gallecda co
Galliathaib na nGall. Is and doronad tinól &ersir; tochostul leosum dano. & ro hellamaigit a llonti leosum dano. &ersir; ra. glinnigit a llo&ndot;ga &ersir; a llaíde&ndot;g. & tancatar co hairm i mbaí Conall.

Ra ergitar tra in tromchoblach mór muride amal at rubramar ba Chonall Cernach mac Amairgin. & ma Findchad mac Conchobuir. amp ma Aed Caem mac Conaill Chernaig. & ma mathib Lochlainne. &
tancatar rempu immach bar Sruthair na Maile Chind Tiri. & atraacht glassanfud in mara móradbuil dóib. & atraachtatar a róin &ersir; a rossail &ersir; a chorrcind &ersir; a chenandáin &ersir; ilríana in mara moradbuil dóibsium dano. Is é tressi inn anfaid ra érig dóib coro rainned in coblach i trí Tanic trian dib ma Chonall Cernach
mac Amairgin. Co Carraic Murbuilg. Tanic trian aile ma maccaib Romra co hInber Semni. Dolluid in trian aile mo Álaib hua Inscoa ríg Lochlainne. &ersir; ma &Fdot;indmór mac Ra&fdot;ir ríg in sechtmad raind do Lochlainn. & ma Báire na Sciggiri a dunud na Piscarcarla. amp dollotar sain co Tráig &mdot;Bale meic Buain. co hInber Linni Liiach-
ainne. Is in tansin ro lluid Conchobor reme cóic&fdot;iur &ersir; tri fichit ar noí cetaib co hInber Linni Luachainne. & ra hecrad tech n-óil &ersir; airaibniusa leis i nDún drech⋅olus Delga. Nirbo chian do Chonch- obor dia mbaí and co facca na corrgabla siúil &ersir; na lo&ndot;ga luchtlethna.
&ersir; na pupla corcarglana. &ersir; na merggida alle illdathacha. &ersir; na confingi catha. &ersir; na síbla&ndot;ga gorma glainidi &ersir; na hidna áig. Maith and sin

a degáes dána sa thís. Tabraid curu &ersir; tenta &ersir; trebairi damsa. Maith a thríath &ersir; a thigerna bar Sencha mac Ailella. cid má tá latsu sain. Mét far ndolaid &ersir; far murir dam far Conchobor. Febus
mo chommain crichi &ersir; ferainn &ersir; &fdot;orbbaid foraib. Febus mo chommain sét &ersir; maíni &ersir; indmassa foraib. Nabad &fdot;uráil dam na ticfad d'ulc &ersir; do maith dam ón chind bliadna ca chéile sibsi na remúr &ersir; na airichill dam. Maith a thríath &ersir; a thigerna bar Sencha mac Ailella cid ma tá latsu sain. Nad &fdot;etarsa am bar Conchobor
act manip íat in Galián Lagen. vel in Mumni mór Muman. vel choiced Ól nEcmacht dariacht and. acht is midlán Inber Linni Luachainne. &ersir; Traig Baile meic Búain. Atiursa brethir ám bar Sencha mac Ailella. nach tarmchillend Herind óclách do neoch dobeir a láim i llaim tigerna nach aichnid damsa. & mad iat fir Herend bes and
iarfatsa sossad catha forthusom no co cend cían coícthigis for mís. Acus mad iat do charait écmaisi bes and a iathaib Gallecda &ersir; Galliathaib na &ndot;Gall. ba ferr son letsu cach maín. Dambad iat bar Conchobor rapad lugaiti bar n-eneclannsi.

Is and sin ra luid reme Sencha mac Ailella co airm i mbaí in
tromchoblach mór muridisin. &ersir; ro iarfach dano díb. Cia dothaet and. Iss ed ro ráidsetarsom dano corbo iat carait écmaisi Conch- obuir ro batar and. Tanic remi Sencha co hairm i mbaf Conchobor. Maith ám a m'anam. a Chonchobuir. iss iat do charait écmaisisiu failet and sút a íathaib Gallecda &ersir; a Galliathaib na nGall. Cid tra
acht nir chutulsa do Chonchobur in Heriu etir ra mét leis a brotha &ersir; a bríge &ersir; a báige. & ro mebaid loim cráo &ersir; &fdot;ola dara bél sell sechtair. & in cháep chró &ersir; &fdot;ola ro boí fora chride is sí ro sceastar ra halt na huairesin.

Maith a Chu Chulaind bar Conchobor gabtar latt gabra Maige
Murthemni. Indliter carpait chethirríad forro. & tabar lett mathi Lochlainne i carptib &ersir; i cethirriadaib co Dún drech⋅olus Delga. Corop fa dreich ríg Lochlainne ecairther in tech óilseo &ersir; aíbniusa. Is and ro gabait gabra Maige Murthemni &ersir; ro hindlit carpait &ersir; cethirriada forro. &ersir; rucait i n-agid ríg Lochlainne. &ersir; tucait iat co
Dún &ndot;drech⋅olus &ndot;Delga. & ra falmaiged in bruiden la Conchobor. Corop fa dreich ríg Lochlainne ro hecrad assa aithle hí & ra ergitar iar tain rannair fri raind accu &ersir; dalemain fri dáil. & ro

dáiled in &fdot;ledsain for mathib Lochlainne. corbat mesca medarcaíni. In n-uair ropo thressiu flaith firu. &ersir; ba comrád cacha dessi &ersir; cach
thrír díb. ra curit ina n-aitib &ersir; ina n-imdádaib &ersir; ina cotaltigib iat. Ro canait ciúil &ersir; airfiti &ersir; admolta dóib. &ersir; tarrassatarsom and co solustrath éirge arnabarach.

Ro érig i&mmacr; Conchobor mochtrath arnabarach. & tucad Cu Chulaind da ⋅aigid. Maith sin a Chu Chulaind bar Conchobor.
Tabar in deired fledi fail acut do mathib Lochlainne corop budechaiti íat. & faitti fessa &ersir; techta uait fó iathaib Ulad cu hócaib Ulad. Frithálter leosom no a carait Gall a Galliathaib na &ndot;Gall. Co ndigiur⋅a co hInber Linni Luachainne. Co &ndot;gabthar sossad &ersir; long- phort lim and. Ráid dam dano risna tri coicait senorach senlaech
ro failet ina ligi aísi fá Irgalach mac Maclaíg meic Congaile meic Vudraige ár &ndot;dichur a &ndot;gascid &ersir; a n-arm. Ráid damsa riu tiachtain lem in fectsa &ersir; in sluaged. combad da réir &ersir; da comairle donethea é Messi da rád riu bar Cu Chulaind ni ebber &ersir; a ndul ní mesti lem dano.

Is and ra lluid Conchobor reme issin rigthech romór i rrabatar na senóraig &ersir; na senlaich. Is and sin tuargabtarsoin a cind assa n-atib &ersir; assa n-imdadaib ra facsin in ríg rosclethain romóir. amp nirbo chutulsa dano dóibsium a menma. Suail nach farroebla&ndot;gatar in bruiden i rrabatar díb. Maith a thríath &ersir; a thigerna bar iatsom
cráet rot astraig &ersir; rot imluaid chucainni indiu. Nach cualabairsi ar se in sluaged combágasa tancatar cethri ollchoiceda Herend chucaind da tucsat a n-aes ciúil &ersir; airfitid &ersir; admolta leo. combad leriti na hairgni &ersir; combad moti na hurbada. &ersir; ra loscit ar &ndot;dúnaid &ersir; ar &ndot;degbaleda connach airddi iat nas a n-airidni &ersir; a n-immellaigi.
& rop áil damsa dano sluaged combága chuccusom. &ersir; combad dabar reirsi &ersir; dabar comairle donethe in fecht &ersir; in sluaged. Gabtar ar sengabra latt &ersir; indliter ar sencharpait co ndechsum in fectsa &ersir; in sluaged latt. Iss and ro gabait a sengabra leosom &ersir; ro hindlit a sencharpait. & táncatar rompu co hInber Linni Luachainne. in
n-aidchisin. & rocuas do chethri ollchoicedaib Herend sain. & ro chrithnaigsetar tri tonna Herend remisin in n-aidchisin .i. Tond Chlidna. &ersir; Tond Rudraigi. &ersir; Tond Tuage Inbir. Is and sin folluid Eochu mac Lucta remi co clannaib dílsib dorecartachaib Dedad co
Temraig Luachra anairtúaid. Is and sin Ailill &ersir; Medb co Cruachanráith Connacht. Is and sin falluid Find inac Rosa rí

Galían co clannaib Deirg imme co Dinn Ríg ós Berba ban⋅olais. Is and falluid Carpre Nia Fer co Luagnib Temrach imme co Temraig. Is and sin ra comarleiced comairle ac Eochu mac Luctai &ersir; ac
clannaib Dedad .i. Cach beó da aissec &ersir; cach aissec da beó imden am a chríchi &ersir; a &fdot;eraind do Chonchobur mac &Fdot;achtnai. &Fdot;athaig .i. Sond i nn-inad cach ⋅uind. &ersir; gríanan i nn-inad cach grianain. Teg i nn-inad cacha tigi. Bó i nn-inad cacha bó dam i nn-inad cach daim. & in Dond Cualngi fair anúas. Comleithet a aigthi do dergór
do Chonchobor don chursain. &ersir; can sluaged combáge d'insaigid fer &ndot;Herend.

Is and sin dano ro faitte fessa &ersir; techta ó Eochu mac Luctai co Ailill &ersir; co Meidb risin comaidsin. Docúas do Ailill &ersir; do Meidb anísin. Ro gabtha gólám dontí o tuctha na comairlisin. Uair
in n-airet bes ocainni nech risba heitir erdorn claidib &ersir; sciathrach scéith do gabail fó brágit ní raga dósum in chomasain. Nad orgenamarni &fdot;ortsu in chomairlisin a merddrech. út bar Ailill. Dáig ni mmó ar cuitni dá ícc sain anda cuit cech &fdot;ir do chethri ollchoicedaib Herend do neoch ra buí for sluagud Tana Bó Cualnge.
At fua limsa ón bar Medb. Cia do ragad risin techtairechtsain bar Ailill. Cia ar Medb. acht Dorn Ibair hua Cipp goband. &ersir; Fadb Darach hua Omna. Mebais a &fdot;áitbiud gáire for Fergus. Cid dobeir th' orfáiltius bar Ailill. fail a morabba damsa sain bar Fergus. Duni is mó is bidba

Is and sin dano ro faitte fessa &ersir; techta ó Eochu mac Luctai co Ailill &ersir; co Meidb risin comaidsin. Docúas do Ailill &ersir; do Meidb anísin. Ro gabtha gólám dontí o tuctha na comairlisin. Uair
in n-airet bes ocainni nech risba heitir erdorn claidib &ersir; sciathrach scéith do gabail fó brágit ní raga dósum in chomasain. Nad orgenamarni &fdot;ortsu in chomairlisin a merddrech. út bar Ailill. Dáig ni mmó ar cuitni dá ícc sain anda cuit cech &fdot;ir do chethri ollchoicedaib Herend do neoch ra buí for sluagud Tana Bó Cualnge.
At fua limsa ón bar Medb. Cia do ragad risin techtairechtsain bar Ailill. Cia ar Medb. acht Dorn Ibair hua Cipp goband. &ersir; Fadb Darach hua Omna. Mebais a &fdot;áitbiud gáire for Fergus. Cid dobeir th' orfáiltius bar Ailill. fail a morabba damsa sain bar Fergus. Duni is mó is bidba
d'Ultaib barsin bith do Meidb da saigid. Uair cenco dernad d'ulc ríam vel iaram friu. acht mad Mend niac Salcholgan do goin bar Renaib na Bóinne ropad lór d'ulc dó &ersir; cid ed bar Fergus ni hecal dó ní don chursa &ersir; teigedsom and. dáig nit feltaig airecta in luctsain. Is and sin tancatarsum rompu co Temraig.

Is and sin falluid Find mac Vosa rí coicid lámdeirg Lagen co clannaib Deirg immisium co Temraig fathúaid co airm i rrabi a brathair Carpre Nia Fer. & atchúas dóib na comadasain. & ra comarléiced acu cia do ragad risin tectairechtsain. Iss ed ro raidsertarsom combad é Fidach Ferggach Feda Gaible. dáig fer
fathach fíamach fírglicc é Is and r lotarsom rempu fathúaith co airm i mbaí Conchobor. &ersir; ro innisetarsom dó na comasain .i. Cach beo da assec &ersir; cach assec da beó imdénam a chríchi &ersir; a &fdot;eraind do Chonchobur mac Fachtnai &ersir; sond i nn-inad cach ⋅uind. &ersir; grianán i nn-inad cach grianain. teg i nn-inad cach thigi. bó i nn-inad cacha
bó dam i nn-inad cach daim. &ersir; in Dond Cualnge &fdot;air anúas.
Comleithet a aigthi do dergór do Chonchobur. &ersir; can sluaged combáige d'insaigid fer &ndot;Herend don chursa. Amlaid baí Conchobor cá n-acallaim &ersir; atbert na briathra.

lg.l: á Meidb is a Ailill amra

div1.p:
Atbiursa brethir ám bar Conchobor connach gebsa comaid dibsin. naco raib inad mo phupla cacha cóicid i nHerind feib ro ⋅aidsetsom a pupla. a mbotha &ersir; a mbélscálana. Maith a Chonchobuir bar
iatsom Cáit i &ndot;gabaisiu sossad &ersir; mórlongphort innocht. I rRos na Ríg ás Bóind ban⋅oluis bar Conchobor. Dáig nír cheil Conchobor riam bara namait bail i &ndot;gebad sosad vel longphort. conna hapraitis combad ecla vel uamun doberad fair cana rád.

Is and sin ra lotarsom rempu co Temraig fades co hairm i mbaí
Carpre Nia Fer. &ersir; Find mac Rosa. & batnoathar dóib na scélasain. Maith and bar Carpre Nia Fer mad cucainni dobera Conchobor &ersir; Ulaid a n-agid. ticed Ailill &ersir; Medb nar furtactni &ersir; nar forithin. Mad sechoind digset i coiced cend&fdot;ind Connacht ragmaitni na &fdot;urtachtsom. &ersir; na forithin.
Is and sin dano ra lotar na techtasin rompo co airm i mbaí Ailill &ersir; Medb. & an uair rancatar ro gab. Medb. ac iarfaigid scél díb. Is amlaid ra buí ca rád &ersir; atbert na briathra.

lg.l: vel inn ed tic do debaid

div1.p: Imthúsa Conchobuir tanicside reme dírrám slóig móir co Accaill Breg &ersir; co sligid &mdot;Breg. And barrecaim Ailill flathbriugaid dosum and. Maith and a Chonchobuir bar Ailill. Cid in dirram slóig móir rofail it egaid &ersir; cid ass áil latt dol.

Co rRoss na Rig ás Bóind ban⋅oluis and so. bar Conchobor Noco glinnigthi duitsiu sain ale bar Ailill acht is foenglinni. Daig ron fuilet in Galían &ersir; Lúaigne na Temrach and sain bardo chind. Geiss damsa dola dom chonair ale bar Conchobor & geiss dam dola i cath can lín. Gabar sosad &ersir; longport acainn and so fodectsa
bar Conchobor. Sáitter ar sosta and so &ersir; suidigter ar pupla. Gníter

ar &mdot;botha &ersir; ar &mdot;bélscáláin. Dentar irgnam bíd &ersir; lenna. Dentar praind &ersir; tomaltus. Cantar ciúil &ersir; airfiti &ersir; admolta acaind and. Is and ro saittea a sosta &ersir; ro suidigthea a pupla. rognithea a mbotha &ersir; a mbélscálain. ra ataithé a tenti. Dori&ndot;gned urgnam
bíd &ersir; lenna. Doronait gretha glan&fdot;othraicthi leo. &ersir; ro slemunchirtha a fuilt. ra minglanta a cuirp. Ro caithed praind &ersir; tomaltus leo. amp ro canait ciúil &ersir; airfitid &ersir; admolta leo.

Maith and sin a Ultu bar Conchobor. in fagum acaib nech dig do midem &ersir; do mórdescain barin slúag. Ragatsa bar Féic mac
Follomuin meic &Fdot;actna Fathaig. Is and sin luid remi Féic mac Follomuin meic Factna Fathaig. Co rránic co Dinn na. Bóinne bánsoilsi. Ar sain ro gab ac midem &ersir; ac mórdescain arin slúag. & ceisis a menma cu mór forthusum 'no. Ragatsa fathúaid innossa bar Féic co hairm i failet Ulaid. &ersir; inniasat dóib in slúag do bith
icom fuatechtsa. Ticfait Ulaid atúaid. Gébaid cách a lathir catha &ersir; comlaind &ersir; comraic dib. Niba mó a nós na allud na erdarcus damsa in chathaigthe assa aithle andá do cech oen&fdot;ir d'Ultaib. & cid damsa na curfind mo chomlund a chetóir romum. & ra lluidsium reme innund dar inber na Bóinne. & tuc bleith
mulind tuathbil forthu. Tuc a n-airthiur fora n-iarthur. &ersir; a ndesciurt fora tuasciurt. &ersir; ro gairset in slúag i n-oen&fdot;echt immisium. & ni forul&ndot;gither dósom beith i cind in t⋅lóig romóir. &ersir; tanicsium romi d'innaigid inn inbir dara tanic innund. & ní hed barroe- bla&ndot;gair dosom itir ón. acht ra li&ndot;gestar saebléim isin &mdot;Boind
&mdot;ban⋅oluis. Mara boí inber bud domni a cheili ara Bóind ro lingestar sáebléim and coro thib tond tairis. Coro báded sin lindsin can anmain etir. Corop búan &ersir; corop marthanach da éis a innchomartha. Corop Lind Féic ainm na linni inro báded.

Rop imgen ra Conchobor &ersir; ra Ultu ro boí in fersain na écmais.
Maith ém a Ultu bar Conchobor. in fagaimse acaib nech dig do midem &ersir; do mórdescain dam barin slúagsin. Ragatsa and bar Daigi mac Dega de Ultaib. & ra luid reme connici in tulaig tigernais cétna as ur na Boinne bán⋅olsi. Ro gab ac midem &ersir; ac mordescin in t⋅lóig. &ersir; cessis a menma &ersir; a aicned &ersir; a innithim &fdot;orthu fon cumma
cetna. Ra baí ca rád na cétna. ragatsa fathúaid ám bar ésium &ersir; inniasat d'Ultaib na slúaig do bith i comúaitecht út. Dorosset Ulaid atúaid. Gebaid cách a lathir catha &ersir; comlaind &ersir; comraic. &ersir; niba mó a nós na allud na irdarcus damsa in chathaigthe anda do cech oen&fdot;ir díbsium. & ragatsa d'innaigid in t⋅lóig coro churiur

mo chomlond romom. Is and sin do lluidsium dar inber na Boinne innund. &ersir; ro mesc barin slúag é & ra theigsetar na slúaig immisium do dib lethib 'no. &ersir; bognítha guin galann de. co torchair accu.

Ba imgén ám ra Conchobor ro bátar sain. Maith ám a Irgalaig meic Maclaig meic Congaile meic Rudraige. in n-abbrai cia as
chóir do thechta do midem &ersir; do mordescin barin slúag. Cia do ragad and ale bar Irgalach. acht mad Iriel gascedach Glunmar mac Conaill Chernaig. Acht is Conall ar choscor é is Cu Chulaind ar chlessamnacht. Is Cathbad druí degamra ar chéill &ersir; ar chomairle. Is Sencha mac Ailella ar síd &ersir; ar ⋅oberla. Is Celtchair
mac Uthechair ar chalmacht. Is Conchobor mac Fachtna Fathaig ar rígdacht &ersir; ar rosclethni. ar thinlucun sét &ersir; maíni &ersir; inmass. Cia do ragad acht mad Iriel. Ragatsa and ale bar Irial.

Is and luid Iriel reme connici in taulaig tigernais cétna ós ur na Bóinne ban⋅olsi. Gabais ac midem &ersir; ac mórdescin in t⋅lóig.
Nir cheiss a menma na aicned na innithim forthusum itir. Atetha a tuarascbáil leiss co hairm i mbaí Conchobor. Cinnas a m'anam a Iriel bar Conchobor. Atdiursa brethir ám bar Iriél dar limsa na fail áth for abaind. na lia for tilaig. na chend róit na sliged bar crig Breg vel Mide nach lán dá &ndot;graigib &ersir; da &ndot;gillaib.
Andar lim at lassar rígthigi di leirgg a tlachtga &ersir; a n-errid &ersir; a n-éttaid bar Iriel. ro ráid Conchobor.

lg.l: In fir a n-atfiadat na fir.
da &fdot;is ca lín atá in slúag;
ni thicfat sund miad nar lac.
is e a &fdot;ír a n-arfiadat. In.

div1.p:
Maith a Ultu bar Conchobor cade far comairle dún in tibirther
in cathsa lind. Is i ar comairle ar Ulaid anad co tisat ar treóin

&ersir; ar tóisig &ersir; ar tigernmais &ersir; ar ful&ndot;gidi catha. Nirbo &fdot;ata inn irnaide dóib &ersir; nirbo chían in chomnaide co faccatar tri carptig dá n-innaigid. Buiden dá cét déc i comair cecha carptig díb. Is iat ro baí and sain triar degaesa dána d'Ultaib .i. Cathbad drui
degamra. & Aithirni Algessach. &ersir; Amargin in fer dána. Maith a ócu bar Conchobor cade bar comairle dún. Is i ar comairle ar iatsom anad co tisat ar treóin &ersir; ar toísig &ersir; ar tigernmais &ersir; ar ful&ndot;gidi catha. Is and sin ra ansat. Nirbo chían in chomnaidi &ersir; nir &fdot;ata inn irnaide. Co faccatar tri cairptig aile da n-insaigid.
&ersir; buiden trí chet dec i comair cacha carptig. Is iat tánic and sin. Eogan mac Durthacht. & Gaíne mac Daurthacht & Carpre mac Daurthacht.

Cade bar comairle dún a ócu bar Conchobor. Is í ar comairle ar iatsum anad co tisat ar treoin &ersir; ar tóisig &ersir; ar tigernmais &ersir; ar
fulngidi catha. Ro ansat. Nirbo chían in chomnaidi &ersir; nir &fdot;ata inn irnaide. Co faccatar tri carptig aile dá n-insaigid. Is iat tanic and sin. Tri meic Connaid Buide meic Iliach .i. Loegaire Buadach. &ersir; Cairell Coscarach. &ersir; Aed Anglonnach. Buiden cethri chét déc i comair cach carptig díb.

Cade bar comairle dún a ócu. Is i ar comairle ar iatsum anad. co. tisat ar treoin. &ersir; ar toisig &ersir; ar tigernmais &ersir; ar ful&ndot;gidi catha. Nad orgen amarni &fdot;oirbsi siii a ócu. Dáig atá trian slóig Ulad sund. &ersir; ni &fdot;ail acht trian slóig fer &ndot;Herend and sút. bar Conchobor. Cid dún na tibrimmis in cath.

Is and sin atraacht Conchobor &ersir; ro gab a chatheirred catha &ersir; comlainn &ersir; comraic imme. Atraacht trian slóig Ulad laisium 'no. & lotar dar inber na Boinni innund. & atractatar na slóig aile dóib ar &ndot;dul dar inber na Boinne innund. & ro gab cách díb ar slaide &ersir; ar slechtad araile. far foirtched &ersir; far foillged. conna baí
samail Ulad ra halt na huairesin. Acht na beth rúaddaire romór bar lár machaire &ersir; na gabad mórslúag na farrad. &ersir; ra étlaithé a cháel &ersir; a mín in &fdot;eda ass. &ersir; ra factha a railge rúada romóra da éis. Is amlaidsin ra slaidit a &ndot;gillai óca aitedchasum. &ersir; a n-aesócbad. conna raba acht a curaid &ersir; a cathmilid &ersir; a ndegláith gaile da n-éis.
Cid tra acht nir barul&ndot;gither da &ndot;gillaib óca aitedchasum. Na cor memaid roscbéim rígdaide díb triasin cath fothúaid.
Is and sin ra tuairced inn Óchaín scíath Conchobuir coro gésestar. Coro gésetar trí tonna Herend .i. Tond Chlidna. &ersir; Tond Rudraige.

&ersir; Tond Tuage Inbir. Coro gésetar scéith Ulad uile inn uairsin.
Cach óen ra boí ara nguallib díb &ersir; ina cairpdib. Is é in lásain barrécaim d'Ultaib tidacht immach. & barrecaim Conall i rremthús resna sluagaib. Acht cid airchind ra betís eich bad luaithiu ná eich Conaill and. Niro lam nech d'Ultaib aiged a ech na charpat do thabairt sech Conall. Iss and sin ra
chonncatar glasláth Ulad gnúis Conaill cucu ra halt na uairesin. & ra ansatar. dáig rap anad fa inneoin leo. & rapo doss díten &ersir; rapo buinne bratha. &ersir; ropo lám i n-uachtur leo Conall. Dáig ba demin leo ni &fdot;il inad i faicfithé gnúis Chonaill ara teichfithe and.

Is and sin ra lotar fón fid ba comnessam dóib. &ersir; ro benatar
dairbre glasdarach i lláim cech &fdot;ir. & ro redigsetar inad da &ndot;dornaib intib. &ersir; tuargabtar rian -aiss na glasgesceda darachsain. &ersir; tancatar maróen ra Conall i cend i chatha. Is and sin barrecaim á rig Ulad tri traigid techid do breith assin chath fathúaid. Dercais &ersir; fégais Conchobor dara aiss &ersir; ra. chonnaic
gnúis Conaill da ⋅aigid. Maith a Chonaill bar Conchobor in cath bar th'oesam &ersir; bardo chommairge. Atiursa brethir ám ar Conall combad assu limsa in cath do thabairt m'oenur a chianaib. andá in maidm do &fdot;ossugud innossa. & dimbúaid do ríg cóicid farsin &mdot;bith a &fdot;acciáil i mmaidm vel i mmórthechiud. & is samlaid ro
boí Conall &ersir; atbert na briathraso and.

Is and sin selais Conall in claideb aithgér. iarlebur assa intig bodba. &ersir; dobert cocetul a chlaidib barna sluagaib. Atchloss rucht claidib Conaill darna cathaib cechtarda ra halt na huairesin. Cid
tra acht feib rachualatar cocetul claidib Conaill. ra chuclaigetar a

crideda. &ersir; ra luamnaigsetar a ruisc. &ersir; ra bansatar a &ndot;gnúisi. &ersir; ra scuich cách dara ais díb ina inad catha &ersir; comlaind &ersir; comraic. Cid tra acht is and sin ra dercastar Conall dara aiss. & rachonnairc da innaigid Mes Dead mac Amairgin. Maith a m'anam bar
Conall a Meis Dead in cath ar th'oesam &ersir; ardo chommairgi. Is ucht ra mórdilind alt neich mar sein itradsa ale bar Mes Dead. Is and dercis &ersir; déchais Mes Dead mac Amairgin dara ais. & rachonnairc da innaigid Ánruth Mór mac Amargin. In cath bar th'oesum &ersir; bardo chommairgi a Ánraid Móir meic Amargin. bar Mes Dead
coro cherddaind mo búraig ferge &ersir; mo thigardail &mdot;bodba farna sluagaib. Is saiget i coirthi alt neich mar sein i trathsa ale bar Ánruth Mór mac Amairgin.

Is and sin fégais Anruth Mór mac Amairgin dara aiss. &ersir; atconnairc Feithen Mór mac Amairgin. Maith a &Fdot;eithin Móir meic Amairgin
in cath for th'oesum &ersir; ardo chommairgi. Coro cherddainse no mo búraig ferge. &ersir; mo thigardail &mdot;bodba forna sluagaib.

Is and sin ro dercastar in Feithen Mór mac Amairgin dar ais. Atconnairc da innaigid in Fethen Bec mac Amairgin. In cath for th'óesam &ersir; ardo chommairgi a &Fdot;ethin Bic meic Amairgin. ar
in Feithen Mór coro cherdainse nio buraig ferge &ersir; mo thigardail mbodba. forna sluagaib. Is essarcain cind fri hallib ám alt neich mar sain ale ar in Fethen Bec.

Is and sin fegais in Fethen Bec dar aiss. Atchonnairc Atherni Algessach da saigid. In cath for th'oesam a Atherni Algessaig
for in Fethen Bec. coro cherdainse no mo buraig ferge &ersir; mo thigardail bodba forna sluagaib Ba chuta dom ⋅eilbse sain ale for seilb neich n-aill n-aile.

Cid tra acht iss and sin atchondairc Atherne Algessach Cu Chulaind da saigid. In cath bar th'aesam a Chu Chulaind bar Aitherni
Algessach. Ba chuta damsa ón ale bar Cu Chulaind. inund són &ersir; daic dím. Act doberimse mo brethir ris ar Cu Chulaind nach fail do Ultaib nech dobera a agid &fdot;ormsa assin chathsa arnad tressiu slaidfetsa cach fer d'&fdot;eraib Herend. na cach fer díbsium. Is and rabert Cu Chulaind béim da lorg&fdot;ertais barna sluagaib. corbdar
comardda comchuibdi iat. Imthúsa Conaill sund innossa. Tanic fona sluagaib. &ersir; dobert cocetal a chlaidib forru. Co torchratar deich cét fer n-armach leis. Rachuala sain Carpre Nia Fer cocetal claidib Conaill Chernaig. &ersir; nir brul&ndot;gither do Chairpriu Niaid Fer eside itir. Naco
tanic reme co hairm i rraibe Conall. & tucastar scíath fri scíath &ersir;

dóit fri dóit &ersir; einech fri einech &ersir; ro gab cách díb oc slaide &ersir; oc slechtad araile. Co clos glóbéim scéith scéith Cairpri Niad Fer fá déis claidib Conaill. & dariachtatar na trí ríg&fdot;ilid ro batar oc ríg Themrach da &fdot;ortacht &ersir; da &fdot;orithin .i. Eochaid Eolach. &ersir;
Diarmait Duanach. &ersir; Fergal Fianach. &ersir; ra chommoratar in tigardail i cend Conaill. Fegais Conall forru. Atdiursa brethir ám bar Conall menbad &fdot;ilid &ersir; áes dána sib. dogebad sib bás &ersir; aided limsa a chianaib &ersir; úair is rábar triath &ersir; rabar tigerna berthai far &mdot;báig cid damsa nach dígelaind &fdot;oraib 'no. & dobert béim
din lorg&fdot;ertais chatha boí na láim dóib co topacht a trí cindu díb. Is and sin dariachtatar buden cóic cét déc do Luaigni na Temrach co tancatar eter Conall &ersir; Carpre Niaid Fer. Co rucatar leo é ar lármedón a catha fodéin. Ro gab Conall ac slaide in t⋅lúaig co dremun &ersir; co barbarda co uathmar &ersir; co dícheillid. coros cuir úad
ina n-ágib minta. &ersir; ina cethramthanaib fodalta. Co torchratar deich cét leis ar larmedón in chatha.

Rochuala sain rí Temrach. &ersir; nir borul&ndot;gither dó beith oc éistecht ra rucht claidib Conaill. &ersir; tanic reime co lármedón in chatha co torchratar ocht cét laech lánchalma leis. Co rocht co airm i
rrabe Conchobor. &ersir; dobert scíath fri scíath &ersir; dóit fri dóit &ersir; einech fri einech dó & ro thuairgestar a scíath for Conchobor .i. in nOchain sciath Conchobuir. & feib ro geisestarside ro geisetar scéith Ulad uile. Maith ám a Ultu. nad &fdot;etarsa cosindiu ar bad chalmu in Galian Lagen na Lúagni na Temrach andathisi.

Is and sin tanic Loegaire Buadach mac Connaid Buide meic Illiach budin trí chét oclách. Commorais a thigardail i cend Cairpri Niad Fer. Is and sin luid Fintan mac Néill Niamglonnaig buiden cét oclách coro mór a thigardail i cend Cairpri Niad Fer.

Is and sin tancatar deich cét ar &fdot;ichit cét din Galián &ersir; di Luagni
na Temrach & tuargabtar leo Cairpre Nia Fer i llármedón a catha fadéin.
Is and sin cunnis Cu Chulaind barna sluagaib &ersir; bar Carpre Niaid Fer. & dolluid da insaigid. &ersir; tuc sciath ra sciath dó &ersir; tuc dóit fri dóit. &ersir; einech fri einech.
Is and sin ra immir Carpre Niaamps. Fer a nert for Coin Culaind &ersir; ro íad a da laim dara armaib ammaig. &ersir; tarlaic rout n-urchair secha ar catha Galian. Is and sin roluid Cu Chulaind

trisna sluagaib immach can &fdot;uligud can &fdot;ordergad Is and barécaim Láeg mac Riangabra dosum &ersir; a airm sénta degniathi
Con Culaind ina láim .i. in Cruadín cotutchend &ersir; in Duaibsech eclach. Is and sin ro gab Cu Chulaind in Duaibsech .i. a ⋅leg fadéin ina láim. ra boc &ersir; ra bertaig hí ra chroth &ersir; ra chertaig. &ersir; tarlaic rout n-urchair uad di 'no. d'innsaigid Cairpri Niad Fer. co tarla na ucht &ersir; na brunni. coro thregd a chride na chlíab coro
raind a druim. dar dó Ni ranic a chorp lár inn uair dobert Cu Chulaind side da ⋅aigid &ersir; co topacht a chend de. & crothais a chend risna slúag iar tain.

lg.l: Beir mo bennact bí dom réir.
da tuca dún tend fri tend
Na cocthaig ra Coin na cless
na cuir tress for slicht do ⋅en.
cocad ruind co bráth ce bé B.

div1.p:
Dori&ndot;gned síd eter Erc mac Cairpri &ersir; Coin Culaind. & tucad Fínscoth ingen Con Culaind do mnaí dosom. & tancatar i cind
⋅echtmaini do dechain inn áir. co hor na Boinne. Bamarni lathi and so &ersir; ba dulig cor ristí ro boí and .i. ri Carpre Niaid Fer &ersir; ba esbach comrac ris. &ersir; menbad Chonall is forainne bad róen. amp ro ráid na briathra.
Tancatar rempu co Temraig aris. Maith ám inti ro boí and so cona brathrib. Rapa leosum Heriu. &ersir; atbert na briathra.

lg.l: Trí meic Rosa Ruaid in rig.
Find i nAlind Ailill i Crúaich
a triar brathair im cach gleó
o fochera in tres mac. T.

div1.p: A hain slúaged catha Findchorad. & in tromlonges timchell i Connachtaib. &ersir; Cath na Macraide.

Fuirim gein toracta tairet aicned n-oll o Adam co n-imthet tre cach n-amsir n-adamrai co betha bráth. berid aicned
enbetu di cech duil derb disin óen conie. cosin oenduine &ndot;deden bías co brunni brátha.

Aliter Turigein .i. toeraegeini .i. gein nerae .i. gein &ndot;gainethar .i. a da choiss reime. &ersir; a chend fó deóid. Dobeir dí a thurigeinsin do chosmailius breithe .i. canaid in brithem fásach fíraicnid &ersir;
roscad filed da chossin inna breithe insin a cend fa deóid .i. in testimoin canone. Inde dicitur. Ni ní nech breth berair rád iar legund léir leraichther nad fri canóin cáid cumtastar. nad fri apstal n-uasal n-ascaider. nad fri Spirut Náem nertar conid cád cach rét co canone com&fdot;í.
Teist .i. a nomine testis. Taurad .i. taur. cech tírim. &ersir; suth &ersir; sín. Taur⋅uth .i. sín tírim. Torc .i. nomen do chridiu. ut Etan ingen Dian Cécht dixit. Ní fó indam dom mo thuircc .i. mo chridi im chliab co fil for crith. Tre&fdot;oclae .i. tri foccuil bite indi .i. da foccul di molud do brith
for culu iiid imderggtha. dofarci an tress foccul .i. foccul ind imdergtha &ersir; aire.

Taurthait .i. taurrachdath .i. arosc reire .i. foceirrdi aurchur n-úait do ermaisin nach rét. Tocuirethar opund a n-anmannae ara chend &ersir; gonti. nó dentai no marbthai i rrec dii tairriuchtsin
iarum asrubrad taurthat. Tigrathas .i. tiugaurradass .i. tigba cach &ndot;dedenach. is he dī is tigradas as tiugaurrad intí scaras frisin mmún fo deóid.

Tugen quasi togen .i. a toga. Aliter. Tugen .i. tuge én. ar is de chrocnib én find &ersir; ildathach dognither in tugen filed coa criss de braigtib cailech lochend. &ersir; da currcib coa cend suas.
coa bragit. &ersir; rvel
Tap .i. pound .i. bidg inde est ni beir tap tigradas is aitte dichíallathar tassec opunn.

Tamlachta .i. támslecta .i. tám ro selaig duíni sin maginsin .i.
in duineba mór. Totegtís na tuatha i mmuige móra. co mbítis i n-oenmagin béus ria n-ec .i. fo bíth a n-adnacuil isna muigibsin. oinafib nad beired in duineba. Ar mad cách ar núair bed marb ina magin fessin. ni bértais dia cellaib. ar ni chumgitís in t-uaithed no bíd i mbethaid a tarrud. inde Tamlachta nuncupatur.
Tendál .i. tene dál .i. dál co tend .i. cosin tenid i nn-ataither in tendál.
Ussarb .i. bás. inde dicitur isind Amrath Chon Ruí ríg ro det ro ussarb nUltaib .i. ro det do Ultaib a bás.

Udmad .i. ud &ersir; damnad .i. crann ar lías .i. gobenn gaibthir
forsin cethrae co ndamnaiter a n-úde i cumu&ndot;g. Udim .i. nomen dond roi tarsa tét a crand bís darsin cléith ocon udmad.

Úr. tréide fordingair. úr chetmus .i. talam &ersir; úr cech nuae. amal as&mdot;berar immb úr. Úr dano cech n-olc. inde dicitur isna
Brethaib Nemed lán do síathach cach n-úr .i. cech n-olc Uch. ab eo quod est ucha .i. clungat. Ubull quasi abull Aball i&mmacr; o burgg Etale dianid ainm Abellum .i. is ass tucad síl na n-aball prius.

Uimm .i. uma.
Uinci etha .i. uaitni etha. Ucht osnae .i. hucht osmenta .i. smuainiud smuaines .i. scrútan scrútas in fili a n-airchetul. in baile dī i scrutan is do is ainm ucht osnae. Finit

lg.l: d'éis Echdach áin. is gait a chlaidib
ro sluind ria sund do druing Dobuill.
Derb ma ro iarfaig cia sóer
Cia ro bui aice ca denam
is Garban sóer oa Gairb o gáel
in fer las tucad a domna
Dia ndechaid Aed co mnai Corrgind
uair nach fer cotaig ro chetaig.
iama chrád for lár a thaige
coro marb Aed iar n-aeth aile
ní tha a díth ol in Dagda
Acht tocbaid in marb ro mudaig
ferr dún trá trell dia thoilseom
Co rraib fo mela fon marbsin
co fagba licc bas bert búada
co crúas chórad uais in t-einer.
Ed asbert oc breith ind eire
Coir cid Ailech do rád ris
or is leis ind inis uile.
cia díne ro gab in inse
Cia rí ro buí for Herind uile
An amser i ndernad in dindgna
tuc la hór a Alpain ergnaid
I n-athiud dofuc dar muir mac
co toracht con ice in dindsa.
and má mnaí la Frigrend foglaig
de arggut de ór de umu.
Mad ngiuil di sein Ailech Frigrend
Ailech Néit ni tréic tre thairthim

head.sup: Fland Manistrech: Cind cethri &ndot;díni iar Frigrind

lg.l: Baí Muridach and dia éis o
la trí secht do Cholmán Rímid.
do Aed Ollán mac Domnaill os iathbla
A sé fo chethair do Chrundmáel
A deich do Mael Duin mac Mael &Fdot;ithrig
Sé mís do Erthaile o Chrundmael
sé mis do mac Maile Tuile.
tri .uii. do Aed Alláin na n-ergal
do Mael Duin mac Aeda Allain.
Oen ar trichait do Aed Ordnide
do mac Máele Dúin do Murchad.
xx. a trí os laechMaig Lí
do Mael Duin do mac Aeda ind Orddain
do Aed &Fdot;indliath fecht ni terc torcaib.
do Murchad Glún i lLár lainech
A .uiii. do Domnall Ú Néill i
iar mbeith i rrígu for Temraig.
eret ro gab Aed ind ainig.
Fég Aed Ordnide is Niall Caille
ni fitir nech coich na cia. C.
Inn eol dúib cath Slebe Cua
for Ailill Molt is mó gessib
Cath Cell Osnaid for sluago Muman
cath i Tuaim Drubi dia ndre&ndot;gat
is for Echaid Sremm i farcbad
is a dó ro rath rele recta
im Aed &mdot;Brec co mbríg docersat and
ro briss Aed Ollán mac Domnuill.
Cath Slebe Tuad ria Subne Mend
Cath Ratha Both ria Subne beos
i mbíth Tnuthgal is Cú Roi
i mbíth Aed mac Cellaig Cualand.
la mac Mael Dúin la Fergal.
Cath in Oscair ria nAed Ollan
Cath for Airgiallo i fích Fiachrach
for coímu in Chóicid nad chromthar
i rrubad Aed Rón is Chonchath.
ced in cath oc Áth Da Charnai.
la Mael Duin nad charad cuindeilg
ria nAed for Claind Colmain comlaind.
ria Murchad muad ba mó gresaib
mebaid ria Niall is ria Murchad.
Cath Leithe in Chaimm ria Níal Caille
for rig nUlad for ríg nAirgiall.
Ro bítha and tri meic Cathail
Cath ria nAed Findliath for Gullo
i rrubad da trian na nDanar.
mebaid for Ulto is for Anbith
Doid&ndot;giu in cath i Cill Ua nDaigri
dia rrubad Mael Garb mac Garbíth
i mbith is mac uathmar Aeda.
is for sluag Gall &ndot;garg. i rrubad
ria n-ú Néill for clanda Conaill
Ocus Cu Dulig a mac is
Dub Tuinne I omnall is Dondchad.
ro bris Ardgair ua na mallacht
ro deligthe a cind ria colaind.
ro briss in cath oc Ath Ergair.
In ruac i mMaig Adar úane
Olc ro batar Gaill in dune
a mbeith cind ar chind ros tenid.
ria mac meic Lochlaind ind lacha
tucad a chend co hArd Macha. A.
Fecht ro buí Muridach mac Eogain
co tart fo thlacht ina thétluing.
co tabrad fiad in dian drechach
dó ba hecen biath ad Echach
don mac cen lín cen choin celig
mac Erca i ndigail a athar
on triath ro thogal mag Muman
rod ciúir i nDún forglas Forgo.
loscud na ríg i nDún Chethirn.
acht is Conall Grant ua Cernaig.
fuair in fael farran i nAiliuch.
Ort leiss Tommaltach mac Dunechda na ndiberg
Dochuaid Aed síar co Tír Da Glass
taeb. acht a réir o Chathul.
co tuc cét a tír Muman.
ort Lagniu o trí sinn oenmís.
ó Áth Chlíath co Carn caem Cornáin
Garg in chrech dorat dar Ultu
Ro briss Aed Findliath for Gaillu
ro élai a llu&ndot;g a athar.
in tan ro dall morríg Mide.
ro bíth la Domn all mac Aeda.
Mael Duin mac Fergaile ind forlaind
ro chacht mac Neill firu Herend.
ro chacht i n-oenuch na n-ollchar
lotar ass síar co Sliab Betha.
Ro briss mac Néill forro do léir
is for Matudán mac n-ard nAeda.
Torolb ro tríall cach rían rethach
dia mboí i llo&ndot;gais Locha chach.
tuc a forbach i tír Temrach.
is de contuil mac Duib Roa.
Ro airgset Gaill glóir Ard Macha mór
ro marb for sét da cét diib.
in caur i diarbo chomainm Cinaed.
ruc mac Néill Conaing in chumtaig.
ar trí .c. cend leis do Ultaib.
Dochuaid hua Neill i mMide múad
Cechaing Aed Ailig for creich i
Maelán docer leo i rroí chatha
Cú Ulad is Aed is Artán.
ní étann nech ní nach ada.
dia n-iarfais nech croda cia. C.
Mór ríg ro gab for Mide
Ó amsir Chuind co cét cath
in magsain mag mór Mide. M.
sin maig i cath Chlo enlocha.
ro marb Aed Slane na sleg
Tri bliadna fa dó don dus
a coic fa chethair tre chuibde
Niall mac Diarmata in daig derg
rop é rí in borrfaith cen brath
tri bliadna ós Chluain Chobthaig cain
is éc atbath rí in Broga
Deich mbliadna i flaithius nar fóen
Dí bliadain flaith in meic maith.
dar éis Mael Ruanaid in raith.
ro marb na brethlaind co mblaid
rí for Midi mall na miach
la Fland in tochuir cen tar
rod marb ciarbo glond co ngail
ro marb flaith gót in gossa
do mac Mael Ruanaid ro cháem.
fuair forlund ic Druim Chriaig cain
éc olc ra scar ra bethaid.
Secht ríg da fichet ríg rúad
iar Con all Breg ni bec slúag.
is é lín ro gab Mide.M.
Ba flaith Aed Slane na slat
co torchair in rí do rind
Conall Loeg Breg ós Boin bricc
Dub Dúin rí Corpri co rath
bliadain i flathius Néill na ndath
fuair aidid la Aed ciar fell
a sé fa dó acht oenbliadain.
i cath Emna Macha i mmaig
Dá ndeich sé bliadna ar bladaib
i cath Chilli Hua &ndot;Daigri a díach
Fichi bliadan a cóic cen chrád
or nach fail sunda co se

div1.p:
ADna mac Uthidir de thúathaib Ól nÉcmacht ollam Herend i n-écsi &ersir; &fdot;ilidecht. Atacomnaic mac laiside .i. Néde. Luid
iarum in macsin do &fdot;oglaim écsi i nAlbain co Eochu Echbél. &ersir; ro buí i farrad Echach corbo eolach i n-écsi.

Luid laa and in gilla co mbuí for brú mara. ar bá baile fallsigthe éicsi do grés lasna filedu for brú usci. Co cuala in gilla fogur issin tuind .i. córus cainiuda. &ersir; torsi &ersir; bá i&ndot;gnad leis. Rola iarum in
gilla bricht forsin tuind coro &fdot;allsiged dó cid ro mboí Co tárfás dó iar sain conid ac caíniud a athar ro buí in tond &ersir; co tucad a thuignech do &Fdot;erchertne &fdot;ile. &ersir; ro gab ollamnas. i nn-inad a atharsom .i. Adnai.

Luid iarum in gilla dia thaig &ersir; adfét dia aite .i. do Echaid. &
asbertside fris eirg do tír i fectsa. ni thalla adar n-écsi ar ndís i n-oenbale. uair forosnaí th'eicsi duit it ollam ar eolas.

Luid iarum Neide reme &ersir; a trí brathir leis .i. Lugaid. Cairpre. Cruttíne. Docuridar bolc belce dóib for conair. Asbert fer díb. cid dia n-apar bolc belce. Uair na fetatar lotar for culu co Echaid
co mbátar mís aice. Lotar for conair doridisi. docuridar simind doib. Asbert fer dib. cid dia n-apar semind. Uair na fetatar lotar for culu coa n-aiti. Documlat úad i cind mís aile. Docuridar gass sanais dóib. Uair na fetatar cid dia n-eper gas sanais. tiagait for culu co Echaid co mbatar mís aile aca.

Oro íctha dóib trá a cesta documlaiset do Chind Tíre. &ersir; luid iar sin do Rind Snóc. Documlaiset iarum a Purt Ríg dar fairgi. corra gabsat i rRind Roiss. as saide for Semniu. for Latharnu. for Mag Line. for Ollorbai. for Tulaig Roisc. for Ard Slébe. for Craíb Telcha. for Mag nErcaite. for Banna. iar nUactur. for Glend Rige. for
Tuathaib Hua &mdot;Bresail. for Ard Sailech fris raiter Ard Macha indiu. for Sídbruig na hEmna.
Is amlaid dano documlai in mac &ersir; craeb airgdide uaso. uair iss ed no bíd uasna hanrothaib. Craeb óir i&mmacr; uasna ollamnaib. Craeb umai úasna filedaib archena.

Documlat iarum dochum Emna Macha. Docuridar dano Bricriu doib. forsind aithche Asbertsaide friu dia tuctais a lóg dó ropad Néde bad ollam Herend. triana chomairle &ersir; triana impide. Dobert Neide lenid corcra do cona cumtuch oir &ersir; argait. Asbert Bricriu

ris dula coro ⋅uided i n-inud ollaman. &ersir; asbert riss ba marb Fer-
chertni. & ba hand baiside fri Emain atuaid oc tuidecht écsi dia éicsinib.

& asbert dano Bricriu ní geib fer amulchach ollamnacht i nEmuin Macha. ar ba naídentasom araí n-aisi. Gabais Neide lán a duirn dond eór &ersir; focheirt brict fair conid ed dommuned cach ba ulcha
baí fair. & luid co ndessid i cathair ollaman. &ersir; gabais a thugnig imme.Tri datha na tugnigi. .i. tugi do ittib én &ndot;gel ar medón. frosbrechtrad findruine forind leith ichtarach dianectair. &ersir; fordath fororda forind leith uachtarach.

Luid Bricriu iar sain co Ferchertni. &ersir; asbert ris. Ba dirsan
a &Fdot;erchertni do chor a hollomnacht indiu. Ro gab fer óc airmitnech ollamnacht i nEmuin. Na lond Ferchertne fri side. & luid is tech rigda co mbaí forsin irlár. &ersir; a lám forsin gabail. condid and asbert. Ciasu file. fili.

Loc tra dond immacallaimsea Emain Macha. Amser dano di
amser Conchobuir meic Nessa. Persa dano Nede mac Adnai de Chonnachtaib. vel is de Thuathaib De Danand dó amal atbeir féin issind Immacallaim. macsa Dana. Dán mac Osmenta &ersir; c. amp Ferchertne fili. do Ultaib. Tucait a denma .i. tuignech Adnai do thabairt do &Fdot;erchertni ó Meidb &ersir; ó Ailill. iar n-éc Adnai. Co
tanic Neide mac Adnaí a hAlpain amal atrubrammar co hEmain co ndessid i cathair ollaman. co toracht Ferchertne istech &ersir; co n-epert ic fascin Nédi.

CIASU FILI FILI IMMA LI TUGEN—CO N-ALLI. .i. Cia suí filed imma llaigend in tuigen co n-álli.
DODONAIRB IAR CETUL CHRETH. .i. dodonasbénand iar cantain a aíi. a éicsi. LA DECIM FELMA C. .i. Is amlaid atchiim conid mac foglamma. FÉR DES ROGREIND
.i. Is de ra orddaig a greind dond éor. I N-AIRB CHRETH CHETAIL .i. in bali ata á cantain a écsi. CIASU FILE FILE NEIT .i. cia suí filed in fili as Nede. vel in file notlach.
Ni chuala cuich inní meic Adnai
i. ní chuala co n-immud fessa. vel ni chuala combad ní etir mac Adnai.

NI CHUALA CO SOLM&Fdot;IS. .i. ní chuala co fiss solam aice.
Mell suide dar ninu Néde. .i. Is aíbind in suide i ndessid Néide. vel dano darmo littre is melta Nede don t⋅uide i ndessid .i. suide i cathair ind olloman. Rad n-onórda in so atbert Nede fri Ferchertne. Arsan. A mmo sruith.
.i. a mmo ⋅uí ind raith. Suí coisc cach suí .i. is súthemail tecosc cech ⋅uad. Suí cech anim aisc .i. dlegair de ⋅uid aisc cech aneolaig.
Asecha riasiu rofiastar .i. dena ar so&fdot;égad riasiu dogné feirg rind. Cia aisc. Cia súg .i. cia súg aisci móri fogebi form. Fo chen cid sathchíall suthe
.i. Is mochen limsa docheilsiu áith súthemail a &Fdot;erchertni. Séim anim ocnait. mani chiastar ceird. .i. Is étrom vel is bec ind anim do neoch a bith óc menip cesti fora eladain. Ci&ndot;g mál
.i. cémnig a uasail innas as dligthechu. Mithadbait .i. is míthaidbsiu sain innossa. Mitharfaid. &ersir; is míthasselbad o chíanaib doratais form.
Domairbir fiadfath co rrubec .i. dorónad mo thairbert do biud &ersir; séot ar m'&fdot;oglaim órbam bec. Ro selai delai fir muaid moínig .i. ro denusa sini ind &fdot;ir maith moínig. ica rabatar moíni na hecisii. Echu
Ceist a gillai &fdot;orcitail can dodechadais. N ede. N i handsa. A sail ⋅uad .i. a comaitecht ⋅uad.

A commur gaíse .i. asin baile a tá comimmad na gaíse.
A forbthib fio .i. assin baile a tá forbthecht in mathsia A lluachair throgan .i. assin baile i fil lí chóir na heicsi. vel trogan ainm do turcbail deirg na grene sin matin.
A caillib .i. a noí collaib na Segsa. Crínmond .i. crethmon .i. creth aí &ersir; mon cles. a caillib dī assa mbenaiter clessa na súad tanacsa.
A cuardaib ane. .i. a caí uird inna fíraíi. inna fíréicsi. Asmidetar fír iar febaib .i. do réir a n-eolais. I forcantar fírinni.
.i. i mbrithemnaigther fírinni. I funethar gó .i. i fescrigend gó I fegaiter datha .i. find i mmoltar. dub i n-aerthar. &ersir; rvel
I nuigter dana .i. immon foglaim. Os tussu a mmo sruith can dollod. Ferchertne Ni handsa. Iar colomnaib aíse .i. iar colomnaib sé áes in duni.
Iar srothaib Galion .i. Boand. uair is ic Laignib atá &ersir; atibseom sruth immais eiste. Iar síd mna Nechtain. .i. ainm do Boind ben Nectain. Iar n-ól dī digi inmais dosom a Boind dodechaid.
Iar rig mna Nuadat .i. iar nirt &fdot;ilidechta Nuadat .i. Nuado Necht ainm filed do Lagnib. &ersir; is dó ba ben Boand. IAR FUTHIUR GRÉNE .i. iar &ndot;degthír inna haí grianda .i. inna heicsi.
Iar n-adbai escai
.i. Rofitir in n-adba i mbí int ésca i llo. &ersir; in grían i n-aidchi. vel iar n-aidchi thanic. issin ló deside tánic.

Iar srinci óic .i. iar srei&ndot;g uaim inna haf óci. vel inna hai as forcthe. vel iarmo
srei&ndot;g oic .i. nomen alicuius partis paruae quae sit in ore infantis in utero matris. cuius nomen est srinci.

Ceist a gillai forcitail cia th'ainmsiu. Nede Ni handsa. Robec
.i. i persaind. Romór .i. i n-eolas. Rothet .i. réid im étail mad gudi nod gesta. vel ro thatnid uaimse. Rochtot
.i. ro chotut é ri écin fair. Rosre tened .i. am rossir amal tenid. vel roseich cucut minchrecad amal tenid. Tene feth .i. Tene na haí .i. foclad co n-imdergad.
Fogroll sese .i. fogur oll in tso&fdot;essa ocum. Sopor somma .i. am topur co n-immud eolais. Slocrech dána.
.i. claidim aí mo dána. Droncherdach .i. am díriuch im eladain. Co teinm a tein .i. co tenmnech amal tenid
Os tussu a mmo sruith cia do ainmsiu. Ni handsa. nessu célaib .i. nesso ciallaib. Cur fethach
.i. am cóir ic fethugud aí foaisnís .i. o &fdot;ir adgair. Freisnis .i. o fir adgairther.
Fochmorc foruis

.i. ata fiss finnitnech acum dia n-athchomarter dim. Fíthe cerda .i. dluthaim eladain. Comrar dana.
.i. cométaim d n. Dramm de muir .i. is dírim in muirse na hecsi. Ceist a gillai forcitail cia dán dognísiu. Ni handsa.
Romna rossa .i. romnad aigthe ic aerad. vel ic molad co tí a nnáre im thidnacul sét dond &fdot;ilid. Rind feola .i. fáebur áere i feóil intí na tincand immo dán.
Fonoch feile .i. fonige na hagthe tria molad. Foscnad anbli .i. nemnári oc cungid neich. Altram creth
.i. foglaim écsi. Cluith do thúr .i. in lucht in mbf enech do thúr. Tochmarc fáth .i. fochmarc inna heicsi.
Cerd cach &mdot;bél. .i. eladu cech duni do &fdot;oglaim ar dáig forcitail caich. Bruud n-immais .i. scailid immad ro&fdot;essa do chách. Imscothud n-insci
.i. séim scoithes a indsci conna bít faidb furri. ImsciNg bic .i. biim i llepaid immalle fri ríg. Búar súad .i. airchetla beca. vel airchetla mora. ara tabraiter bai do ⋅uid,
Sruth fail .i. aiste imda. vel immad na hecsi. vel fál gotha cáich. vel Inis Fáil. Forcital n-imda .i. fogla im do écsinib. Áil ríg risi rede
.i. is áil dona rigaib na scéla taitnemcha uaimse.

Os tussu a mmo sruith cia dán dognisiu. Ni handsa. Foram cotaith .i. for⋅emnigud do chungid seoit &ersir; bííd.
Costud sída .i. álim síd do chách .i. brithemnas do chach.

Sretha fairne .i. seoit do &fdot;airind .i. srethugud a dáme for fecht féle .i. cétadaig aígidechta duni do thig a cheli conid lánbiathad dliges iarum in
n-aidchisin. acht corop deithbir no n-imluade. &ersir; a biathad iarna dáim &ersir; iarna grad &ersir; iar n-úasli &ersir; iarna lín. Gnáth les immorro dó cech tan rachas o sain immach. ní dlig acht lethbiathad &ersir; ni dlig cid éside menip ra deithbir dig.

Fochoid ocnóe
.i. is fo chataid biim con ríg co mbiim i n-amsa. Noud cerda .i. erdarcaigim eladna. Cossair ócríg .i. biim for comdergud fri ríg.
Riascad Boinne .i. indsce ind immais doci&ndot;g iar &mdot;Boind .i. Ro ascim na cnú docuridar Boand .i. cnoi ind immais.

Briamon smethrach .i. bri briathar &ersir; mon cles .i. cles briatharda sin dognítis ind
&fdot;ilid .i. cenéle nemthiusa in sin .i. smitt a chluasi do gabáil inna láim .i. amal ná fil cnáim and sin. is amlaid na fil enech vel nert acontí écnaiges in file.

Sciath Aithirni .i. áer &ersir; glám dícend &ersir; áilges. Ailges .i. gudi ail dobertis ind
ollomain for cech oen dia túaith im sechtmad lóig a einig cech aín iarna grad &ersir; iarna thochus do thabairt dia ollomain dílis do chind airm &ersir; étaig. dó ria techt i tír n-echtrand. Bá hí i&mmacr; a chommaín sin ond ollomain .i. tobuch dia thuathaib a cruid dar cocríchaib dia n-argtis eat .i. tria rennaib áer &ersir; glám &ndot;dícend bale i femdebtais
im assec tria brectrad molta. ar rosegat renna na n-aer conair nach rochet renna na n-arm.
Erraind n-ais a sruth buais .i. is uais ind rand rosiacht ar immad a dag&fdot;essa .i. ollomnacht Barand immais

.i. is lia ind rand immad in t⋅oais fil acum .i. na .uii. n-asti. bííd a bara forsintí nom cráide co ndenand a aír. Aicde menman. .i. do réir menman cáich no mmolaim. Minairbe cerd
.i. aiste beca. Costud réil .i. sídugud solusta do chach. Rissi ruada .i. scéla gaiscid &ersir; imdergtha cáich riana briathraib.
Rout noithe .i. erdarcaigim aisti iar setaib dligid. Némain i fothud .i. is gilidir némaind aní &fdot;othaigim. Furiud fáth
.i. fethnaigthir seoit damsa. Iar nath .i. iar n-asti. Ceist a gillai forcitail cid fotlaimtherso .i. c'eret not luamnaigther. Ni handsa.
i mmag n-aesa .i. i forlethet aísi thegim. I sliab n-oíted .i. i n-ard na oíted .i. i n-óclachas. i fiadach n-aise
.i. issin n-aís fathaig i tucand nech fátha. i lluna threith .i. i llenmain ríg inna magrianan. I nn-othrai .i. i n-adbai. uathuinni .i. i n-adbai úre &ersir; chloche .i. úath úir &ersir;
ond cloch. Eter othain &ersir; a chend .i. eter in n-adnacul &ersir; in mesrugud. Eter cath &ersir; a &fdot;uath .i. sídugud eter lucht in chatha. &ersir; iss ed is &fdot;uath issin chath na
hairm. vel eter fid &ersir; a imscothad. &ersir; eter fid &ersir; tech .i. conara. eter imda &ersir; airidi. Eter triunu Tethrach .i. eter na treono Tethrach .i. ainm ríg Fomore. Eter sostu siloin

.i. eter na sostuda i silend cach .i. taige na mbriugad. &ersir; rvelvel silóin .i. imda dessi &ersir; tríir. vel síloin .i. sil daglaech. vel siloin .i. ili sceo oen. Eter sruthu íuil .i. eter srothu ind eolais imdai .i. ind forcitail.
Os tussu a mmo sruith. Cid fotlaimtherso. Ni handsa. I sliab &ndot;graid .i. i n-uaislidetaid na &ndot;grád. I commuin fáth
.i. commuin na foglamma. I fuithriu aesa iúil .i. fothir ind aesa iúil .i. uasail. I n-ucht n-osnai .i. i n-ucht na sona .i. na rríg &ersir; na mbriugad.
I n-inber raithe .i. i n-inber ind ratha .i. i n-ollomnas. I n-oenuch thuirc thréith .i. i n-oenach meic ind ríg .i. clúim &ersir; cholcid. &ersir; rvel I fochataid fer nai
.i. is fo chataid na fer nua .i. na rríg nua biim. vel fo chátaid na scíath ferna. I fanu folerbad fal romiad .i. is fán i mbíd immad na fer romiadach i mbás. Ceist a gillai forcitail. Cisi chonar dollodsu.
Ni handsa. for clar find fessa .i. for clár da less .i. in loc asa téit ind noídiu. For cúl tréith .i. ulchi fri ulchi frisin ríg biim .i. i frithchetfaid ina imdai.
For fidrád n-ais .i. iar cach aís i n-araile vel for fathrath ind &fdot;essa nuíi. na hecsi. For drumni daim inn air .i. for drumni in daim aires in n-aír. For soilsi samlaam
.i. mo dán trén amal ⋅olsi ind laí ⋅amraid .i. in tan bís caín domnach is menic m luan alaind ina diaid. For maethla matha. .i. forsna maethla mathi .i. mess &ersir; torud. vel na .uii. n-aiste.

For dructu déa.
.i. ith. vel cenele forcitail. For unce n-etha .i. uate ind etha .i. becan do arbur la biad n-aile dó vel for óenchoí ind iatha .i. ind &fdot;eraind.

For ath n-uamain
.i. for in n-aí n-áith is uamon la cách .i. ind écsi. For sliastai sadbai .i. sliasait fri araile frisin ríg in t⋅oadbai i mbí i tig midchuarda. Os tussu a mmo sruith cisi chonar dollodsu. Ni handsa.
for echlaim Loga .i. is e Lug arránic óenach &ersir; liathróit &ersir; echlaisc. For luani &mdot;ban &mdot;baeth .i. for lonloi&ndot;giu ban vel chiche ban ro diul.

For folt feda
.i. for dagalt feda &ersir; déich &ersir; réime &ersir; rvelvel cranna gai. For cend &ndot;gai .i. i commaid ríg ar 's é is chend isin táth. vel claidib .i. techta n-anruda. For fuan n-argit
.i. etach co n-argut. For creitt cen &fdot;onnad .i. eich cen charpait. vel for creit in dána. For fonnad cen chul .i. for carpat cen chlaine.
For trian fessa Meic ind Óc .i. ní fitir cuin atbela &ersir; cia haided no mbérad &ersir; cia fót forsa n-epelad. vel fot geni &ersir; fot a bais &ersir; adnacuil

Ceist a gillai forcitail cia doaisiu mac. Ni handsa.
Macsa Dana .i. im macsa ica tá dan. Dan mac Osmenta .i. iarna múnud damsa co úais. Osmenta mac Imráti.
is tuisechu in t-imradud oldás in. munud uais. Imradud mac Ro&fdot;is

.i. is tuisechu in sin oldás imrádud a &fdot;oglamma o neoch. Ro&fdot;is mac Fochmairc .i. is tuisechu in dagimchomarc forin fis oldás in fis do bith oc
neoch. Fochmorc mac Rochmairc .i. is tuisechu in roimchomarc ón magisteroldás a dagimchomarc on descipul deside. Rochmorc mac Ro&fdot;essa
.i. is tuisechu in ro&fdot;is do bith oldás in roimchomarc. Ro&fdot;is mac Rochuind .i. is tuisechu do neoch rochodnaige aice andas foglaim do denam aice. Rochond mac Ergnai
.i. is tuisechu etargna vel intliucht do bith aici oldás codnaigi do thasselbad dó
Ergna mac Ecnai .i. Is tuisechu do neoch in t-ecna do bith i n-anmain oldás a thasselbad.

Ecna mac na trí &ndot;Dea &ndot;Dana. na tri dei Dana. tri meic Brigti ban&fdot;ili .i. Brian &ersir; Iuchar &ersir; Úar tri meic Bressi meic Eladan &ersir; Brigit ban&fdot;ile ingen in Dagdai Móir ríg Herend a mmathair. & ainm dóside in Ruad Ro&fdot;essa atberar sund. vel Cermait &ersir; Dermait &ersir; Aed.

Brigit ban&fdot;ili ingen Rúaid Ro&fdot;essa. .i. ainm don Dagda. Ruad Ro&fdot;essa mac na n-ule &ndot;dana .i. mac oca mbí in dán uile. Is aire dano beres Nede a genelach cosin luctsa ar is occu ro buí suithe na hécsi co comlán. A dualus a aíse dano atbeir Neide conid mac cech oen dibseo diaraile. ar
is é in t-athair leis intí bís i rremthechtas. &ersir; is é in mac intí bís i tiarmoracht.

Os tussu a mmo sruith cia doaisiu. mac. Ni handsa. Macsa fir ro buí nad rogenair
.i. Ádaim. Ar adnacht i mbrú a mathar .i. i talmain. Ro basted iarna écaib .i. i césad Crist.

Arnaisc a chetgnúis .i. is é cétgnuis dochuaid i mbás peccaid. Cétlabrad cech bí .i. á Iachtad cech mairb
.i. ach. Ailm irard a ainm. .i. is uasal &ersir; is ard a ainm .i. ailm .i. Adam. Ceist a gillai forcitail. in filet scéla latsu. Filet écin. Scela mathi
muir thorthech .i. im iasc &ersir; rvel Tracht ruirthech .i. Roirthach do lo&ndot;gaib &ersir; bárcaib. Tibid fidraid
.i. bolga in blátha. Techtait fidlaind .i. tiagait ass na lanna co ff .i. in gentliucht. Fechait oblaind .i. ablanna &ersir; corp Crist.
Asait ithgoirt .i. Asaid ith isna gortaib. ili becha maíni .i. immad maíne bech. vel is imda somaine issin bith. Bithsorchi
.i. solus. Síd subach .i. fáilid. Sam sogar .i. is dagthorthech in samrad.
Sluaig rathaig. .i. gabait rath o ríg &ersir; doberat diarailib .i. d'aes dána. Ríg griandai. .i. solustai. Gafs adamrai
.i. admórdai. Echtraid cath .i. Regait ass na catha. Cách dia cheird

.i. fora eladain &ndot;dligthig.
Fir d'&fdot;ogail .i. do dénam gaiscid. Grés for mna .i. nná fri druine. Munbrec láith
.i. latir grega i n-imriadaiter. Muín gárit .i. gárit maíne dona filedaib dar cend a n-aiste. Laith lán .i. bid comlán in flathius i mbiat sain.
Lán cach cerdd .i. bid comlán cech eladu. Caín cach fó .i. taitnemach cech maith isind amsirsin. Fó cach scél.
Scéla mathe. .i. is maith cech scél atchuas anuasana. Os tussu a mmo sruith in filet scéla letso. Filet écin scéla uatha olc amser bithbias. i mbiat ile cenna.
i mbiat úate enig. ar bebait bí banmessu. .i. epelait na henig ona beoaib. iar firmessamnacht. Biaid búar in domain dithoraid .i. cen lacht vel cen dáir. Dichrechnaigfit fir feile
.i. nare vel guth cen einech. Friscichset midaig mor&fdot;lathe .i. friscuichset as na mmór&fdot;lathe móra vel miadacha. Biat olca fir. Biat uati rig
.i. iar &ndot;dligud. Biat ile anflathe. Bit dala athisi .i. biat imda daini co n-aithis forro. Bid ainmech cech duni.
Dobebat iar curiuch carpait .i. epelait ass na carpait iar cóir &fdot;ích. Conmelat n amait Niallmaige

.i. Ériu. Niam fir febaib
.i. ni hanacol do neoch a &fdot;irinni nach a thochus. Fessaiter im chella cathasa .i. fichfiter catha ac cosn am na cell. Bid furside cech dán. Bid furglide cech gó
Ragaid cech oen assa richt .i. assa dirgidetaid. la úaill &ersir; dímmus. cona fogentar feb .i. tochusa.
na haes .i. sinsirecht. na enech .i. im eneclaind. na hordan
.i. im grád. na dán .i. im &fdot;ilidecht. na forcital .i. im legend.
Forbrisfider cech trebar .i. gabail a eille ond áes dímaínech. Bid pauper cech rí .i. bid bocht cech rí cen chuind tairismi oca .i. tri cuind tairismi dlegair don ríg oca .i. tri puirt.
Dimicnigfider cech sáer .i. cech socheniuil. Conutastar cech dóer .i. conturcebthar cech drochcenel. Cona aderthar Dia na dune.
Dobebat flathi ria n-anflathaib. la fursmalta fer &ndot;dubga .i. la formailt na fer oca mbít na gai duba. Dobaidfither cretem .i. cen adrad Dé Ro fuasnabthar adbarta
.i. cen tabairt edbart. Focichsiter solaig

.i. cemnigfiter for sailgib na n-ecailsi a gait estib. Docichliter cella. Forloscifiter ecailsi.
Arfássaigfiter culi cessachtaig .i. cen biad intib. Airdibada dochell blatha .i. mess &ersir; to rud. Artisat toraind audbretha
.i. Toitsat ass na toraid triasna gubretha. Adbeba cach a choí .i. epelaid cach a choíi. a chuaird gemrid fora doercheli .i. fora dóerbiatachu. ar ni biat aci biataig. tria olc na hamsire.

Forcichret for collaib coin congala. Co tossnófa cách fora dáim
tria duba &ersir; díbi &ersir; dothchernas. .i. cach fria daim dia marbad .i. im anfalti &ersir; im dailus. &ersir; im dothidnacul.

Attach &ndot;daibri &ersir; dibi &ersir; dothchernais fri diaid in domain dedenaig .i. Ragaid cách i mmunigin a daidbri &ersir; a dothchernais. i nderiud
domain. Dala ile fri aes cerd .i. tair imbárach vel innairther. Fochiura cách cainte do chániud dara chend .i. cennaigfid cách cáinte do imcháined dara chend.
Dobera cach crích for araile. .i. ar dochill. Echtrannfaid fele for cach dind. connach ain lepaid na luge .i. fellfaid cach for inti bias ina lepaid. Genfaid cach a chomaithech.
Mairfid cach brathair araile. Genaid cach a choimthechtaid di chomol &ersir; comlongud conna bia fir na enech na hanim and.

Immuscredfaifet duthernai .i. immuscraidfet drochthigernai ara lín.
Immusnaerfat anflathi .i. lécfit a n-aír La anfeth cach duba. Doirtfiter grada .i. tusliud.

Dorromnaibter clerchechta. .i. brécairecht. Dimicnigfiter suid. Sóifit ceóil co bachlachu. Sóifid fiannas i cella &ersir; i cleirchiu
.i. étaige amsaide vel cumri. Saifither ecna i ssaíbretha .i. gebthair ciall ecoir ass. Soifid dliged flatha for eclais .i. Rath do thabairt dond laith a eclais.
Sóifid annach i corraib bachall .i. i n-aes &ndot;gráid. Sóifid cech lanamnas i n-adaltras .i. i rreib irgarthaib. Soifid roúall
.i. sechtair. & roimtholtu i mmaccu aithech .i. grád Fene vel chille. Sóifid rodíbi &ersir; rodochell &ersir; rochessacht i córaidi .i. i mbrugaidib cen chathim cen tidnacul.
Combtar duba an-anai. .i. co mbatar dorchi. Sóifid rodruine i n-ónmite. &ersir; atchessa .i. athcisaige. Co sailfiter etaige cen líga
.i. co n-aicfiter étaige cen datha .i. cen imdenma óir is argait. Soifid es&mdot;bretha i rrigu &ersir; tigernu .i. soibbretha &ersir; fingala. Sóifid digaire &ersir; rosire i mmenmain cech dune .i. menma mór.
Conna fogenat mogaid na cumala a comdedu conna cechlat ríg nacha cocerta. conna coistifet ind airchinnig fria manchu &ersir; a mmuntera.

cona fodena in císaige craic a dligid dia &fdot;laith .i. abbad do erraid.
conna fogena in manach dia dilius. cona fodema in ben brethir a cétmuntire uaste. conna fogenat. meic &ersir; ingena a n-athre. nach a mmathre. cona urerset felmaic a fithithre.

Sóifid cách a dán i saíbforcital &ersir; i saibintliucht do chungid derscaigthe dia fithithir corop maith lasin sosar bith ina ⋅uidiu.
&ersir; a ⋅inser uasa chind. conaba imdergad lasin ríg vel lassin tigerna ragas do ⋅ainól vel ⋅ainithe ar belaib a chele fod&ndot;gena. vel ar belaib a dámi &ersir; a thascuir dodisia.

Conaba imdergad lasin fer trebtha bith ic lo&ndot;gud iar n-iadad a thaige frisin fer cerdda renas a ainech &ersir; a anmain ar bratt &ersir; ar
biad. co sáife cách a óil fria cheile oc sainól &ersir; oc sainithe. Co llinfa ro⋅ant cach ndune. Co rirfe in fer uallach a enech &ersir; a anm a.in ar lóg oenscripuil.

Dichrechnaigfither fele. dínsémtair popuil.
dibdabtair flathi. dinsémtair gradai. digradaigfider domnach. diromnaibter littre .i. saebchiall estib. vel cena ndathug.ud.
Dichlannaigfitir filid .i. conna biat filid acht baird nammá Forbuascaigfider &fdot;irinni .i. fíroscaigfider ass ind &fdot;irinni. Forosnaibter gúbretha in domain dedenaig.
Forloscfiter torthi iarna tadbsiu. iar la tola n-echtrand &ersir; daescar⋅lúag. Biaid forlucht for cach bruig. Brogfaitir cricha i rroilbi. bid romag cach ro&fdot;id.
bid ro&fdot;id cach romag. Ar fogena cach lín a muntire. .i. biaid a ord i mbreith a muntire i calad. Ticfait iar sein tedmand ili ancride. Atcha ellma uathmara.
Lochait bledmand crand .i. biaid dorchatu and in tan blaidfait na craind ic maidm. Gaim dullech. sam subach .i. dorcha.
fochmuine cen messu. errach cen blathu.

marta la nuna .i. gorta. .I.edmand for cethraib.
bedcacha.

div1.head: Cathcharpat serda
div1.p:
ATchondarc and carput féig foduirn fethamail findruine. co llús co llúas co llangliccus. co pupaill uanicda Co fertsib findruini. Co rrothaib finduma. Co creitt uraird dírig drésachtaich
dásachtaig caemchnessairt cholggfata. cholggatchain. Co carput chraeslethan chraesluath. ar da n-echaib cróda comardda. At íat bágaig bruiche bolgruisc. At é dronchobcha. At íat cendbeca cruindbeca baslethna. leslethna. Cruich lúig. At iat redgcaig bedgaich bolgsróin bruinnideirg co lluas ainle vel chliabaig dar cétroí
vel side gaethe dar cend magdaire machaire. Is é tricci &ersir; tarpigi &ersir; trebarluas connagat na eich ardmora aibinni atchonnarc amae.

Atchonnacc and araile ech luath lutlugmar luglemmennach. maignech tairngech fulud cetharchrua. lúth buada beres conbenas. Aíblech tened trichemruaid taitnes dar craes a globarchind.
Dofuil araile and ech cenand cael coscrundfata seng seta seredchael. casmo&ndot;ggach chaschairchech drondub dualach dualbras ir&fdot;orad ard imamnais.

Dofuil sin charputsin laech folt&fdot;ind foltlebor nirt chomsid cumachtaig. lainech derg daigerla na láim. hí ar derglassad
anflaith uas én etarluamnaig uasaib dó Dofuilet tri fuilt arin laechsin. folt dond fri tuind. folt find iar n-irmedón. mind n-orda ra tuigedar. Uii. tibri cechtar a da grúad.uii. ruithni cecha tibri dibside. uii. meic imlesain cechtar a da rosc. rind glasgorm gér lais. Uii. meóir cechtar a da lám. Dofailet araile cechtar a
da choss. Fuan casscorcra imbi. Mílech óir deirg issin brutt osa bánbrunnichair. Dofuil léine ⋅lemunchael ⋅ítaide i caustul ra gelchness dó Dofilet cethri léinti fichet tarsibsin ammuig anechtair. ar is iatsin bít ri baccaib &ersir; refedaib dósom. Dofuil cathchris comlaind imbi. Co&ndot;geib ó chond a leisi co holl a ochsaille.
Dofuil inar fandchlechtach forórda immi. neoch mar im&fdot;úaig snáthat d'ór iarna írbrunniud vel d'argut arna ⋅ochumtach. Dofuil bern&fdot;uathbróc srethach sróllaide cona cimais de banór bricc ria sechtair. Congeib ar tiug a bán⋅liasat co cumtuch a chuirp. Dofuil cathbarr cirach clárach comecartha do gemmaib solusglana
do chumtuch ingantach tiri Arabiae .i. críchi na Sorcha. a ferand mín Manannam doberthe dosom do ascid &fdot;latha. Dofuil bopulsciath dub delgnach díchummais. cona deich findbolggaib fichet findruine.

cona imlind airaird ordaide cona ⋅laitt comthind chreduma cona bil aithgéir argdidi. cona loss imthróm iarnaide. fedagin fail co
cuired i talmain hí do chur ber &ersir; sleg &ersir; saiget &ersir; rend &ersir; arm &ersir; faebur. Cona slabraig linig loga dar gelgualandchur dó Dofail claideb claslethan cruaidgér cona da traigid n-imchumside eter da n-og n-im&fdot;aebair dó Co feit co cruas co colgdirgi. co llethad finna fri barr&fdot;oth. ra gére &ersir; áithe &ersir; eltnadacht dó Co truaill
&fdot;éta &fdot;ichthi finddruine. co n-imsci&ndot;g airgdide co cumtuch órda. Da ⋅leig crandmóra cendglassa cúicrindi curatta laiss. is iat nemnecha faeburgoirti co crú dia ruamnaitis rind. Co súanmib ruisc rogaid. tria &fdot;agaib na crand ciaburderg.

Ara comsid círdub i n-airinuch in charpait. Cochullbratt sróllaide
imbi. Clár gemnide do lííc logmair co&ndot;geib dara béletan conid dín ar derdain &ersir; donind dó, na léic bréic tessaidechta na inorbairt gréni chuci. Crand casmo&ndot;gach na láim. magarscís echraide.

Samalta lim ra trí airdi ind echradsin. elta duben ós chind arbaige. vel ra cáer tentide. vel ra cith snechtaide. ba samalta lim na fóit
tarrruada tairrdergga curit i cleithe &fdot;irmimenti ic drecma erma darsin mag. Ba samalta lim fri spo&ndot;caiblig teined trichemrúaid taitnes dar craes glóbarchind dóib.

Flesc arggit gil i lláim ind arad ic sobrostugud na hechraide na tiagat céim forddail acht ammar as dess &ersir; as less &ersir; as licht lassin
óclach atchonnacc. At.

DO nemthigud filed i scélaib &ersir; i comgnimaib in so sís da n-asnís do rigaib &ersir; &fdot;lathib .i. uii. coicait scél .i. coic coícait de primscélaib &ersir; dá coícait do &fdot;oscélaib. &ersir; ní hármiter na fosceóilsin acht do chethri
grádaib tantum .i. ollam &ersir; anrath &ersir; cli &ersir; cano. Acus iss iat so na prímscéoil .i. Togla. &ersir; tana. &ersir; tochmarca. &ersir; catha. &ersir; uatha. &ersir; imrama. &ersir; oitte. &ersir; fessa. forbassa. &ersir; echtrada. & aithid. &ersir; airggne.

.i. It iat so trá na Togla .i. Trechuairt Tigi Lir. & Tunide Tige Burig. &ersir; Smutgal,Tige Duma. & Deochair Tige Cathbath. & Togail
Tige Nectain. & Togail Bruidne Uí Dergga. Togail Bruidne Broin meic Briuin. &ersir; Togail Bruidne Huí Duile. & Togail Bruidne da Choca.

.ii. Tána tra in so .i. Táin Bó Cualnge. Táin teora n-erc Echdach. Tain Bó Rois. Tain Bó Regamain. Tain Bó Flidaisi. Tain Bó
Fraích. Tain Bó Fithir. Tain Bó Faílín.,I ain Bó Gé Tain Bó Dartada.Tain Bó Craebain.

iii.Tochmarca in so sís. Tochmarc Meidbe.I ochmarc nEmire. Tochmarc Ailbe. Tochmarc Etaine. Tochmarc Faefe. Tochmarc Feirbe Tochmarc Finnine. Tochmarc Grene Finne.Tochmarc
Grene Duinne. Tochmarc Saidbe ingine Sescind.Tochmarc Fithirne &ersir; Darine da ingen Tuathail. Tochmarc mna Cruinn. Tochmarc Eithne Uathaige ingine Crimthaind

.iiii Catha dano in so .i. Cath Maige Tured. Cath Talten. Cath Maige Mucrima. Cath Dromma Dólach dara díta Cruthnig. Cath
Maige Rath. Cath Coraind. Cath Cláire. Cath Toíden. Cath Temrach. .u. Uatha i&mmacr; in so .i. Uath Angeda. Uath Ecalsa. Imchummair. Uath Belaig Con Glais. Uath Licce Blada. Uath Maige Uatha. Uath Maige Imbolg. Uath Beinne Etair. Uath Locha Lurgan. Uath Dercce Ferna. Uath Úama Crúachan.
ui. Imrama dano in so .i. Imrom Maele Duin. Imrom Hua Corra. Imrom Luinge Murchertaig meic Erca. Longes Breg Léith. Longes Brecain. Longes Labrada. Longes &Fdot;othaid.

Oitte dano in so .i. Aided Con Ruí Aided Con Culaind. Aided &Fdot;ir Dead. Aided Conaill. Aided Celtchair. Aided Blai Briugad.
Aided Loegaire. Aided &Fdot;ergusa. Aided Chonchobuir. Aided &Fdot;iamain.
Aided Mael &Fdot;atharlaig meic Ronain. Aided Taidc meic Cein. Aided meic &Sdot;amain.

Fessa i&mmacr; in so .i. Fess Tige Fir Blai. Fess Tige Bichair. Fess Tige Tulchinne. Fess Tige Trichim. Fess.Tige Lí Fess Tige Line.
Fess Tige Guit. Fess Tigi Gnaair. Fess Tigi trí mac Demonchatha. Fess Tigi Auscle. Fess Tige Mell Dolaig. Fess Cruachan. Fess Emna. Fess Alend. Fess Temra. Fess Dúin Bolgg. Fess Dúin Buchet.,

Forbossa dano in so .i. Forbais Fer Fálga. Forbais Etair. Forbais Aichle. Forbais Dúin Bárc. Forbais Dúin Binne. Forbais Fer Fidga.
Forbais Life. Forbais Ladrand. Forbais Dromma Damgaire. Echtrai i&mmacr; in so .i. Echtra Nera Echtra Fiamain. Echtra Con Ruí Echtra Con Culaind. Echtra Conaill. Echtra Conchobuir. Echtra Crimthaind Nia Náir. Echtra Macha ingine Áeda Ruaid. Echtra Nectain meic Alfroinn. Echtra Ailchind meic Amalgaid.
Echtra &Fdot;ind i nDerc Ferna. Echtra Aedain meic Gabrain. Echtra Mael Uma meic Baitain. Echtra Mongain meic Fiachna.

Aithid i&mmacr; in so .i. Aithed Mugaine re Fiamain. Aithed Derdrinne re macaib Uislenn. Aithed Aefe ingine Eogain re Mes Dead. Aithed Naise ingine Fergusa re Nertach mac ui Léith. Aithed mna Gaíeir
meic Deirg re Glass mac Cimbaetha. Aithed Blathnaite ingine Puill meic &Fdot;idaig. re Coin Culaind. Aithed Grainne re Diarmait. Aithed Muire re Dub Ruis. Aithed Ruthcherni re Cuanu mac Cailchin. Aithed Eirce ingine Looirn re Muridach mac Eogain. Aithed Díge re Laidcnén. Aithed mná Ailella meic Eógain re Fothud Canann

.xii. Airgne dano in so .i. Argain Maige Cé Gala mac Febail. Argain Átha Hí Argain Dune Dubglaisse. Argain Dinn Ríg. Argain Atha Cliath. Argain Duine Delga. Argain Tuir Chonaind. Argain Ailig for Néit mac Indui. Argain Belcon Breifne. Argain Cairpri Cind Caitt for saerchlannaib Herend. Argain Echach fora maccaib.
Argain Chaille Chonaill. Argain Donnán Ego. Argain Maic Da Thó Argain Mac Magach. Argain Side Nenta. Argain Sratha Cluada. Argain Sleibe Soilgech. Argain Ratha Rigbaird. Argain Ratha Ruis Guill. Argain Ratha.Túaige. Argain Ratha Tuaisle. Argain Ratha Tobachta. Argain Ratha.I.imchill. Argain Ratha
Cui&ndot;ge. Argain Ratha Cuillend. Argain Cróchan. Argain Cathrach Boirche. Argain Ratha Blai. Argain Ratha Gaila. Argain Ratha
Uillne. Argain Ratha Náis. Argain Benne Cé Argain Ratha Granaird. Argain Ratha Búirig. Braflang Scóine. Aigidecht Artúir.

Is amal phrímscéla dano ármither na scelasa sís .i. Tomadma
&ersir; Físi &ersir; Serca. &ersir; Sluagid. &ersir; Tochomlada .i. Tomaidm Locha Echach. Tomaidm Locha Éirne. Fís mná Nemid. Fís Conchobuir. Fis Cuind .i. Baile in Scáil. Fis Fursu. Serc Callige Berre do &Fdot;othud Chanand. Serc Dubi Lacha do Mo&ndot;gan. Serc Gormlaithe do Niall.

Sluagid tra so .i. Sluagad Augaire Móir co hEtáil. Sluagad Dath Í co Sliab nElpa. Sluagad Neill meic Echach co Muir nIcht. Sluagad Fiachna meic Baítáin co Dún &ndot;Guaire i Saxanaib. &ersir; primsluagid Herend archena.

Tochomlod Partholoin dochum &ndot;Herend. Tochomlod Nemid co
Herind. Tochomlod Fer &mdot;Bolg. Tochomlod Tuathe De Danand. Tochomlod Míl meic Bile co Espáin.Tochomlod Mac Miled a hEspáin i nHerind.

Tochomlod Cruithnech a Tracia co Herind. &ersir; a thochomlod ó Herind co Albain. Tochomlod Longsi Fergusa a hUltaib.
Tochomlod Muscraigi de Maig Bregoin. Tochomlod na nDési ó Themraig. & Tochomlod Clainne Echach Mugmedóin a mMide. amp Tochomlod Céin ó Chassiul. & Tochomlod Dail Riatai i nAlbain. & inní ro hort &ersir; ro bíth &ersir; atbath. ni fili nád chomgne comathar na scéla uile.,

NA trí Fothaid .i. Fothad Airgtech &ersir; Fothad Carptech. &ersir; Fothad Canann. Oendé &ersir; Cloendé &ersir; Trendé a n-anmand.Tri meic sin Fainnchi ingine Náir meic Aurmora do Aradaib Cliach. & Téite ingine Maicniad meic Lugdach meic Dáre Deirg meic Gnathaltaig
meic Nuadat Necht meic &Sdot;étnai Sithbaicc. Bert Fannchi emnu .i. tri fermaic. Atberat araile do Ibdachaib do Ultaib a mbunadas .i. da mac do Iriel Glúnmar. Forc &ersir; Imboth. Fosracaib Rectaid Rigderg i nAlbain. Ro maidset catha remib comtar fasa crícha mára i nAlbain coro giallsat do Rechtaid Rigderg. A quibus Tuatha
Forc &ersir; Imboth. i nAlbain. Dollotar .lll. anair co ngabsat Cluichri Cliach &ersir; ní fortaat. Gabsat crích Mani &ersir; Fiachrach Aidni. &ersir; crích &mdot;Bascind a comarbus a senathar Echach meic Luctai .i. Uathni &ersir; Éli. dí ingin Echach meic Luctai. Tír nEile otá Sinaind sair &ersir; fodess.Tír nUathni otá Sinaind siar &ersir; fothúaid co Dergderc. Conid
ó anmannaib na mbansin dogardar a cenela. Ár dolluid in dara n-aí .i. Éile co hÉli Rigderg conid de dogarar Éli. Luid dano araile .i. Uathne co Fergus Foltlebor conid de dogardar Úaithne. & ro batar cethri níaid do chlaind aicce .i. Uathnia &ersir; Drúthnia. Caínnia &ersir; Deochnia.
Tri meic Nuadat Nécht. Gnathaltach sen athair na Fothud. & Baiscne senathair Find. & Fergus Fairge senathair rigraide Lagen. amal asbert Find.

lg.l: firsat Macnia Lugdach luind Daire Deirg.
Lond Lugaid. Find file. Ros Ruad.

div1.p:
INis Dornglais ro gab Crimthand mac Fidaig for maccaib Echach Mugmedoin Dochuatar meic Echach Mugmedoin for iar tain i mMumain iar n-éc Crimthaind meic Fidaig.
co tartdad cath do .i. cath Corad Caenraige cor siar &ersir; coro gonad Fiachra mac Acus is é ros gon Máge Messchor ach co n-erbailt i Foroí coro hadnach Coíca giall tucsat meic Echach aníar iar &mdot;brissiud in chath I cind mís iarsin chath robo m Coro hadnacht na géill beo ind ríg. Is iar
sain ro gabad Dún Daire da Bróc Caílle Galeng for bru &ersir; Ailella. Co rrucad Ailill i &ndot;giall &ersir; coro marbad Ailill and lasin ríg

Temaile fáid Miled Espáin d druim Témaile. is é ro inni Espáin tuirthet a chlainne co br profetia eius baile,Themaile.

p.emph: A Cín Dromma Snecta so sis

div1.p:
Asberat senchaide boí longes ingen Ebríb ar cind mac
Miled i nHeredo rála anfud mara issin n-ocian de Muir Tirrén co ndasralatar i nHerind. Bátar re maccaib Miled. Asbertatar iarum fri maccu Miled ba tochu dóib a tir fein &ersir; ni treic fitís cen tinscra friu ar chardes doib. Is de at fir crenda mnáa i nHére co brath

Aír imchrenait lanamna isin domun olchena Abratruad gilla Conchobuir meic Ergab gilla Fergusa. meic Roig Calbmether gilla Celtchair. Cromm Slige gilla Conaill Cernaig.
Garbrétach gilla Cormaic Cond. Longes Fuibne gilla Eogain meic Durthacht. Trotgal gilla Fergusa meic Leti. Balcbend gilla Ailella meic Matach

lg.l: Nabal in ben fiad cach slóg.
